segments.text: You have a lovely house , Jack .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thank you . But a number of things have been going wrong lately .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That's too bad . What problems are you having .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , the whole house needs re-painting for starters . The carpet in the living room is worn out , and I'd like to put in new wall-to-wall carpeting . Last week , I had to call the plumber to fix the toilet . Anyway , all par for the course when you own a house , I guess . I think I am going to hire an interior decorator to look the place over .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , I think a crystal chandelier would look great in your living room , and maybe some new drapes for the windows . Also , a grandfather clock would look great in the den . Perhaps you could buy some potted plants for the dining room
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , you really do have a talent for this , Alice . Thanks for the suggestions .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You are welcome , Jack . Glad to be of help .
segments.speaker: S1
